name: Pothole Rush
description:
Made for the ROC Game Dev Game Jam III. Theme: Intentionally Broken

Collect and use jackhammers to clear potholes and to stun your friends. Race to get the best lap time!

  • Supports controllers (xbox 360/One, Playstation Dual-Shock 4)
  • Supports up to 4 players
  • Options (Volume)

// Controls //

Left analog/Up arrow = Accelerate

Right analog/Left and Right arrows = Steer

Right trigger/Space = Use jackhammer

Start button/Esc = Pause

// Team //

Dakota Herold - Programming, Design

BC Likes You - Art, Design, Announcer

Nick Basch - Music, SFX
